title: Leaving For Central City (Part 1)
body:
Leaving For Central City (Part 1)

"Now even without using shadow energy, I can face a hunter who just reached S rank," Evan muttered, seeing the dead Cockatrice.

He landed beside it and summoned Adam to look for the core, but unfortunately, he didn't find any core this time.

"Even without core, I can get its skills using the second effect of growth link skill." Evan wasn't disappointed when he did not get the core of the Cockatrice and used his shadow resurrection skill.

(Shadow resurrection failed)

The scales of Cockatrice cracked and blood started to come out from its body when shadow resurrection failed.

Evan raised an eyebrow and used shadow resurrection again.

(Shadow resurrection failed)

Woosh!

The cracks on Cockatrice's body expanded and a fountain of blood erupted from its body.

Evan's heart skipped a beat when he saw the condition of the Cockatrice's body.
